data.eml:eml: Polymorphism and inconsistencies in the taxonomy of Diplodinium anisacanthum da Cunha, 1914 (Ciliophora, Entodiniomorphida, Ophryoscolecidae) and taxonomic notes on the genus Diplodinium Schuberg, 1888

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cedrola, Franciane, Dias, Roberto Júnio Pedroso, Martinele, Isabel, D’Agosto, Marta (2017): Polymorphism and inconsistencies in the taxonomy of Diplodinium anisacanthum da Cunha, 1914 (Ciliophora, Entodiniomorphida, Ophryoscolecidae) and taxonomic notes on the genus Diplodinium Schuberg, 1888. Zootaxa 4306 (2): 249-260, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.2.5
